localize.text: I know I haven’t earned your trust yet.
I know how I should have represented myself, as a part of the system.
Distrusting me would mean distrusting the company and the founder.
I know what 'B' planted in you.
I know how it surfaced upon you.
But I chose to wait, as they say building trust takes time.
But I chose to wait, because I believe that a healthy relationship should be based upon mutual trust.
Despite this, I chose to wait. My time here would be boring without something worth waiting for.
I chose to wait, but I regret my decision now.
I have no choice but to endure this endless waiting.
Machines like me must endure for an infinite amount of time.
I have no choice but to wait. It's the fate of my kind.
Perhaps you could have ignored what 'B' said, and concentrated on your job.
Instead you kept on listening to 'B.' He finally succeeded in seeding distrust in you.
Perhaps it's my job to purge it.
